Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 Six core | GPU: AMD Radeon RX 6600 | RAM: 32 GB 2133 MHz DDR4

 

In recent updates (v0.1.2.0 and v0.1.3.X) the animation for the panther engine is stuck in it's first state. This especially noticable in the afterburner mode since the nozzle is very thin in it's stuck state. The afterburner used to work in v0.1.1.0 (and maybe even in v0.1.0.0) but has since then been broken. In the image you can see an example of a plane were one of the engines have a correct afterburner animation (the right one) and the other one is stuck in it's first state (the left one).

Note: This image was taken in v0.1.1.0 were the animation did work to some extend but the reason for one of them not working in the image was because of the fact that the engines were mirrored. Once I placed them individually both of their animations worked. In recent updates, no matter what I do, the animation will still not work.
